hackathon-description-text: We truly believe that community is such an important part of what we do and we really wanted to try to put together an event that would allow developers from across the Islands to come together in venues within their own communities, but also participate together as a whole.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This prize will be drawn from a pool of all team members on teams that submit a working application by the deadline. This scholarship can be gifted to a single individual for them to use towards a future DevLeague cohort. Recipient must pass entry coding exam.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=307 Kamani St, Honolulu, HI 96813, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Developers will be graded on the following criteria: Design, Effective Use of the Uber API, Utility/ Impact, and Originality.
Not every idea has to have an amazing architecture and UI, sometimes it's just a great idea from out of left field. Impress us.
The Oh So Pretty Award is to be awarded to the application submission with the best design. One of those moments when you just say ahhhhh.

This award goes to a promising young developer with a strong desire to learn. Know someone on your team you think is a great candidate. E-mail us at 
 and tell us who they are and why they deserve the award.
You know who this is. The one who just can't pull themselves away and puts everything they have into getting the project done on time for the team!
Do we really need an explanation for this one? Keep in mind, best dressed is a very relative thing.

hackathon-location-description: The Box Jelly, Oahu | Startup Suite 8, Big Island, MRTC, Maui | Anchor Cove Shopping Center, Kauai
